snippet: The “unindicted co-conspirators” were believed to have had knowledge of, and joined in, the plans to cause major traffic congestion in Fort Lee, N.J., over several days in September 2013.
abstract: Federal Judge Susan D Wigenton orders prosecutors to release names of people connected to George Washington Bridge lane-closing in 2013 who were not charged with crime; two employees of Port Authority of New York and New Jersey have faced charges in connection with scandal.
lead_paragraph: The “unindicted co-conspirators” were believed to have had knowledge of, and joined in, the plans to cause major traffic congestion in Fort Lee, N.J., over several days in September 2013.

headline.main: List of Officials Linked to George Washington Bridge Scandal Will Be Released
headline.print_headline: Judge Wants  List of Officials  in Bridge Case  to Be Released

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
